articles.author: Matt Rosoff
articles.title: I just spent my first week ever with an EV, the Chevy Equinox — here’s what it was like - TechCrunch
articles.description: The funnest car I ever drove was the original Tesla Roadster. This was in 2011, back when Elon Musk's EV company was courting press instead of denigrating
articles.content:
The funnest car I ever drove was the original Tesla Roadster. 
This was in 2011, back when Elon Musk’s EV company was courting press instead of denigrating us, and they offered me a test drive. I to… [+7990 chars]
